text:
[https://celebsgraphy.com/kayleigh-mcenany/ Kayleigh McEnany] (born April 18, 1988) is an American spokesperson, political commentator, and writer. She was a former CNN contributor. She was made national spokesperson for the Republican National Committee in 2017.
In February 2019, she was named national press secretary for Donald Trump's 2020 presidential campaign. On April 7, 2020, she was appointed White House Press Secretary.
On October 5, 2020, McEnany tested positive for COVID-19.
